attributes.action: Make Claudia winkleman a dame for her being such an icon on the traitors
attributes.additional_details: Urge Parliament to support the nomination of Claudia Winkleman for a national honour (such as a damehood) in recognition of her outstanding services to UK television and entertainment
attributes.background: Claudia Winkleman’s distinctive style and brilliant humour have become iconic on British TV. Her long-standing commitment to UK broadcasting has brought joy to millions. We call on Parliament to recognise her outstanding contribution and lasting legacy by any means possible.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions asking for people to be given honours or appointments.
